description: This clip mount holds a radar and laser detector firmly on a car's visor, letting the driver confidently detect signals from X, K, and Ka bands while on the road. Escort recommends using the visor clip only when the top of a car's windshield isn't obscured by dark tinting. If your car does feature a dark-tinted windshield, consider using a windshield suction cup mount instead. The visor clip fits the current Escort Passport 8500 X50, Solo S2, and Passport 7500S models, as well as earlier Passport 8500, 7500, 6800, 5000, 4600, 4500, and 4200 units and RD-5110, Solo 5, and Solo 4 detectors.
title: Escort 57-000027 Visor Clip Mount for Radar and Laser Detectors
